title: Honor 0
body: So a while ago I got demoted to honor 0, and I mean like many many months ago, since then I haven't been as toxic, I've been keeping up with being friendly and throwing out those GG's after the game, obviously everybody has bad games and someday's people are more toxic than others, but I've been honored by all 4 teammates multiple times since then, usually I get 1-4, a handful of times I've received none, but I'm reading the patch notes and it says honor 1/0 will not be reset, when will my honor be restored? What do I have to do to get it back? I'm really confused about all this so any help would be much appreciated{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: It doesn't take a set amount of honors or games played, but you just need to keep playing games while staying honorable. Keep in mind that any kind of behavior that could warrant punishments could make it harder to climb back up.
